elems.desc: oral metronidazole 500 mg three times per day for 10 days has been used for treating mild-to-moderate cases of CDI
Vancomycin orally 125 mg four times daily for 10 days is considered superior to metronidazole in severe C. difficile disease
Fidaxomicin orally 200 mg twice daily for 10 days may be a valid alternative to vancomycin in patients with CDI
